languages.text: The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: The wielder suffers −40% less damage from psychic abilities. When the wielder suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away. If the target fails a Toughness test, it becomes prone for 1 round. Base armour property: +30 Strength.

The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic abilities. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a Toughness resistance test, it gets knocked prone for 1 round. Base armour property: +30 Strength.

The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

languages.text: El portador sufre un −40 % menos de daño de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} psíquicas. Cuando el portador sufre daño de una capacidad psíquica, la energía absorbida y redirigida {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes, alejándolos 2 casillas del portador. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +30 de Fuerza.

When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: El portador sufre un −40 % menos de daño de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} psíquicas. Cuando el portador sufre daño de una capacidad psíquica, la energía absorbida y redirigida {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes, alejándolos 2 casillas del portador. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +30 de Fuerza.

languages.text: 装备者受到灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}攻击时，承受的伤害降低40%。当装备者受到灵能能力伤害时，会吸收灵能攻击的能量，将周围所有敌人{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}2格。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：+30力量。
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: 装备者受到灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}攻击时，承受的伤害降低40%。当装备者受到灵能能力伤害时，会吸收灵能攻击的能量，将周围所有敌人{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}2格。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：+30力量。

languages.text: L'utilisateur subit 40 % de dégâts en moins lorsqu'il est la cible de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} psychiques. S'il subit des dégâts provoqués par une capacité psychique, l'énergie absorbée et redirigée {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} tous les ennemis adjacents à 2 cases de l'utilisateur. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +30 de Force.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur subit 40 % de dégâts en moins lorsqu'il est la cible de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} psychiques. Lorsqu'il fait l'objet d'une telle attaque, l'énergie absorbée et redirigée {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} tous les ennemis adjacents de 2 cases. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +30 à la Force.

languages.text: Der Träger erleidet −40 % Schaden durch psionische {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}. Erleidet der Träger Schaden durch eine psionische Fähigkeit, sorgt die absorbierte und umgeleitete Energie dafür, dass jeder angrenzende Feind 2 Felder vom Träger {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}weggestoßen{/g} wird.Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +30 Stärke.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erleidet -40 % Schaden durch psionische {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}. Erleidet der Träger Schaden durch eine psionische Fähigkeit, sorgt die absorbierte und umgeleitete Energie dafür, dass jeder angrenzende Feind 2 Felder vom Träger {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}weggestoßen{/g} wird.Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +30 Stärke.

languages.text: 使用者が受けるサイキック・{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によるダメージが−40%減少する。使用者がサイキック・アビリティによるダメージを受けると、吸収し再放出されたエネルギーが、隣接する敵全員を使用者から2セル{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：腕力 +30。

When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が受けるサイキック・{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によるダメージが−40%減少する。使用者がサイキック・アビリティによるダメージを受けると、吸収し再放出されたエネルギーが、隣接する敵全員を使用者から2セル{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：腕力 +30。

languages.text: На 40% сокращает получаемый урон от псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. При получении урона от псайкерской способности поглощенная и перенаправленная энергия {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противников, находящихся на соседних клетках, на 2 клетки от персонажа. Базовое свойство: +30 к Силе.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: На 40% сокращает получаемый урон от псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. При получении урона от псайкерской способности, поглощенная и перенаправленная энергия отбрасывает противников, находящихся на соседних клетках, на 2 клетки от персонажа. Отброшенные цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

На 40% сокращает получаемый урон от псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. При получении урона от псайкерской способности, поглощенная и перенаправленная энергия отбрасывает противников, находящихся на соседних клетках, на 2 клетки от персонажа. Отброшенные цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
